author: jleroux
msg: Update defaultValveFilter using http://tomcat.apache.org/tomcat-6.0-doc/config/cluster-valve.html as reference, with our own specificities (.*\.ico;.*\.htc;) even if I guess It's not a big deal. This is mostly a reference for future.
I wonder though why "\" were not used previously, maybe an older version of Tomcat cluster-valve
